about_the_game:
Humanity. Humanity never learns.
We had over 2.6 million years to learn to live and create instead of killing and destroying. We failed.
The remnants of our once vast and vibrant world now lie buried under layers of radioactive dust, a testament to our failures. Civilization has been reduced to pockets of survivors scattered across the barren lands, each day a struggle against both nature and human nature.



You enter this world as someone who has lost their memory. To recover your past, you will need to travel across multiple different areas, all set in an atmospheric wasteland. You will not just face deadly threats from various creatures and hostile gangs but also help multiple surviving communities.
To finish your journey you will have to adapt, learn new skills and get better equipment.



Mutated creatures. Gangs. Starving communities. You will encounter all of this on your journey through a post-apocalyptic world. Dust & Rain is built around a deep and atmospheric story you can dive deep into. Your choices will affect the world around you more than you think. You can discover more of the world through exploration and through a complex dialogue system, and lay the foundation stone for a new world.




To survive and defeat the coming threat, you will have to learn new skills and customize the stats of your character.
Will you focus on weapon handling? Or would you rather invest more points in skills like chemistry and medicine, and learn how to repair pre-war machines? it's up to you which skills you master and use to solve quest and challenges.





Are you struggling to find a good game with quests that offer multiple solutions where your skills matter? Dust & Rain features a complex quest system where you can choose how to solve quests, often facing moral choices and multiple solutions. It's up to you to shape the world.



After you finish your first quest, you will have little more than a few bullets, an M1911 MKII, and a crowbar. Loot enemies and take quest rewards to get better armor and guns to survive in the wasteland. You will fail on your journey without proper gear.
Find your style and favorite weapon type. What's your pick? Pistols? Rifles? Shotguns? The choice is yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Face hostile wasteland, face combat challenges and do moral choices in immersive, story-driven top-down RPG Dust & Rain. You will need to adapt and learn new skills to survive. Your actions shape devastated world. Who will you become?
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Czech, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
